text:
Happy Monday! Sharing  a couple of the latest episodes of the 3C Podcast that launched.

Appreciate everyone in this group that has provided feedback so far. I'm having fun learning from so many marketers.

There's an episode coming soon from a connection I made in this group. Best of luck getting off to a great start this week. :100:

<https://www.meetfathom.com/blog/new-3c-podcast-dumpster-fires-and-distributing-content-the-abm-way-with-terminus|Dumpster Fires and Distributing the Content the ABM Way with Terminus>
<https://www.meetfathom.com/blog/new-3c-podcast-episode-talking-growth-marketing-with-alaina-thompson|Talking Growth Marketing with my teammate Alaina Thompson>

attachments.text: We are on a mission to provide value to B2B content marketers abound. Rewind the VHS version of your content strategy. Let us help you deliver the Netflix experience.
